Package fr.lipn.nlptools.utils.align

Interface Summary
AlignerConsumer An "aligner consumer" is a class that takes as input the output from the InputReader (which depends on the AnnotatedTextReader).
FilterTokenAndAnnot An object can implement this interface to filter special cases in SimpleTokenByLineReader and SimpleTaggedTextReader.
InputReader The InputReader is responsible for reading the reference (input) text.
TagPositionConsumer.AnnotationReceiver Interface to communicate with the actual final consumer, which knows what to do with the annotations.
 

Class Summary
AnnotatedTextReader Main class in the package.
CharByCharTextLocator This class is used to provide detailed information in error messages about the position where an error happens.
SimpleInputReader General reader processing alignment in a simple way: simply sends separators (if necessary) to the consumer; any token received from the annotated text must at least be a prefix for the current token in the reference text (possibly ignoring case).
SimpleTaggedTextReader This AnnotatedTextReader reads input from a Reader object where annotations are provided as usual tags: <mytagname myattr=myval ...
SimpleTokenByLineReader This AnnotatedTextReader reads input from a Reader object where annotations are provided line by line, i.e. each line has the form: "<token> <annot 1>...
TagAlignerWriterConsumer Simple text writer for alignment process, reading and writing tags as annotation (like <mytag> ....
TaggedTextAligner A main program for standard alignment, file to file and reading/writing annotations as tags.
TaggedTextAligner.TagPositionWriterConsumer  
TagPositionConsumer A simple AlignerConsumer which requires only position of annotated text, reading tags as annotation (like <mytag> ....
TokenIteratorInputReader This InputReader reads tokens from an iterator over PositionedText objects.
VoidInputReader This is a special InputReader which does not read any original input text: it only transmits the data received from the AnnotatedTextReader to the AlignerConsumer.
 

Exception Summary
AlignmentException Simple exception class for this package.
